answers.answer: I think the water is your weight divided by 2, not plus 2.No wonder you can't drink all the water, LOL!  I can't even drink it all and I'm only drinking half my weight in ounces.You'll be able to get through the it.  Just do it one day at a time.  I hear that people who get sx right away will see them start to taper off after a while.  Mine didn't start till after the 8th week.

LOL.. they gave me this kit at the drs office and it had a water bottle that has 16 oz marker on it and at the bottom it says to drink your weight + 2 in ounces each day.I am also diabetic, so this has been hard, as I need to eat, but every thing tastes funny.. metalic taste.  and worse.  when I ate it apple, tasted like it was fermented.  My yougart tasted like vomit, and a pear made me gag.   I feel hungry but by the time I cook it.. I am ready to get sick and can only eat a small amount.  I have been getting at least 16 glasses of water a day so far.  But can sure tell when its time for more if I get lax in drinking it.   Muscles in my neck start to tense and feel a headache coming on.I went thru Interferon treatment for 6 mos, 13 years ago.   I was SRV after 6 mos testing and lost insurance and things changed, never tested again till recently.  When the diabetes came up.But I will get thru it One day at a time.  I just have to keep telling myself that, and pray it gets better not worse.I am in Florida too. Where abouts are you ?Dana

I have always loved water but this is a whole new ball game. I drink cranberry juice but cut it with enough water that it's not too sweet. My dr. said any kind of liquid that doesn't have caffeine. I drink the 'light' juice with splenda.I get that headache too when I don't drink enough. I eat peanut butter toast when I take my morning riba. I don't think the pills cause fever, I think it's the shot. Just my opinion.I feel best today, thursday, then tomorrow starts over again. I will do shot 4 tomorrow, not too far ahead of you.Hang in there, it stinks that you have to go thru this again!Best wishes for svr in '07!Bug

I'm in SE Florida, near Ft. Lauderdale.  Where are you?  We have quite a few Florida neighbors here.I agree about the headache.  I start getting one immediately if I don't keep drinking water steadily.  I guess that's our body's way of reminding us to drink it.I hope that food starts tasting better soon.  Try eating your food at room temperature, or starting with something really bland like saltine crackers.

I guess the fever is there while the shot is still in system ?.  I feel much better today.  Slept like a baby last nite.  But my internal clock wakes me at 5 am every day..Yes its a drag having to go thru this again, but at least its supposed to be less harsh compared to the old treatments.  I am just glad my insurance didn't fight it that it was pre existing.    I am in the Tampa area.I was reading that some take the Riba first ?   My doctor had me do the shot last Friday morning in his office, then told me not to take the Riba till the next morning.   I see others did it the other way around.    I am having dental surgery on Tuesday, and just really worried the tx will make the pain worse ?   I guess I will just see how it goes.  I want the Dentist to knock me out .. they are pulling 8 teeth, and putting in a denture.  I just hope I can do this..  I will try the peanut butter toast from now on.  I did get some of the flavored waters too.   But one of them tasted like celery the otherday and it really turned me off.  It was supposed to be punch flavored.  LOL
Celery?? You make me laugh. Hate to have your tastebuds right now BUT I would love to lose ten lbs!Bug

My husband is also diabetic, so it's a challenge handling both things at the same time. He has to eat nutritious foods for the diabetes, but he's also had issues with the taste of food. He feels hungry, and then can hardly eat when he tries to. He's still getting bouts of naseau (sp?) We'll be glad when this is over!! It's funny, though, about your apples and yogurt tasting bad...apples and yogurt are about all he can eat when he's not feeling well! Go figure! He's lost a lot of weight, too. Probably about 40 lbs and he's on week 31. I keep trying to get him to eat. He's lost enough weight for now!!

Yah I was already losing due to change in diet for the diabetes, but I think it has alot to do with all the water we have to drink.  I guess I read that bottle wrong. it did say body weight divided by 2, not + 2.  LOL. So means I am right on target then for what I need to drink.  I thought I was not getting enough, but I have done fruit juice too watered down..I was on a plateau for losing until I started tx, now it seems like I lose close to 3 lbs a day.  Well just home for lunch. so time to get going already.. then come home and take the dreaded shot.Have a good day.D

Either my Redipen malfunctioned or something. I do not think I got a full shot.  the mark on my stomach is only half the size of last weeks, which is still red .   Will the pharmacy give me a replacement ?  and should I do another one ?  I did not have any sx this time.. none.  thats why thinking I did not get a full dose.

When you call the hotline be prepared with a lot of info. They'll want the lot number, pharmacy number, prescription number, expiration date and a partrich and a pear tree. They can help over the weekend but won't be able to submit the order to regular business hours (Tues after the holiday)Good luck, I was told later by other forum members to just do another pen if I had any doubts, others have done that w/o drastic sides.Bug

Thanks for the insight.  I called the Nurse In charge, and they didnt seem to be too concerned on replacing it for me.  Told me to call my Dr next week and let him know what Happened and not to take another shot.  since I did get some of the meds, just not all of it, she says don't want to take a chance of getting too much.   I was feeling fine all day too , since I got up at 5 am.  But I was tired this afternoon and took a nap.  Now kinda feeling that dizzy feeling when I lift my head.  Just seems weird it would have taken till just a bit a go, to have any sx from the shot .    I took it at 6:30 yesterday evening and went to bed.  I sold my bucs tickets for tomorrow thinking I would not feel well enough to do all that walking.  And being in the direct sun at the game.   Oh well.. My sweetie is feeling like he is coming down with something, so its just as well.  Just gotta keep from getting what ever he is getting.  LOL .   I hope all is going well for you on treatment and that your sx have not been bad.

hi dp.i'm on shot two, as well.  i'm having similar reactions to yours.  for what it's worth, i also missed getting the full second dose (my innate clumsiness intervened) and felt much better this week.hopefully it's coz my body's adjusting to the meds and not coz i didn't get the full shot.i'll keep checking your posts.best of luck in your treatment.wyntre

Yes I feel much better this week.   After saying I had no real symtoms yesterday, I started feeling a bit light headed..you know that feeling you get when the flu is kicking in.   I a had a small dull headache at back of head, but advil too it away.  I did take a nap yesterday and went to sleep early last night, so maybe that helped too. After taking a nice hot bath.  I feel fine today.. Getting ready to go eat something so I can take the Riba pills.Its sunday and the family expects bacon & pancakes today.. LOL  So better go get busy.Hope you continue to have a sx free treatment.  I think we are going to be fine as far as side effects, Just take one day at a time and you will be fine.D
same thing happened to me - felt ok saturday and today i couldn't get off the couch.HNYwyntre

question: I took my 1st shot last friday, and had a rough 2 days, by Sunday was feeling better till I take the Riba.. then kinda feel out of it.   Same on christmas, was still having chills after the pills and a fever of 101.9.  Had hard time sleeping, tossed and turned alot.   Went back to work on Tuesday, and have felt a bit better everyday since.. till I take the pills.  My stomach burns really bad.  I have been drinking so much water, but not near what the Dr says I need to drink.  My weight + 2 in ounces per day.   Man thats alot of water.. LOL   I have already dropped 10 lbs this week.  Felt sick a few times, but managed to keep those reflexes in check.. Oh how I hate to get sick.  I keep getting bouts of crying and thinking I cannot handle this for a year.  I just hope it gets better, and not just a repeat week after week.. Just when I feel better, its time for another week of it ?Congrats to all that have made it where they have.  And prayers that the rest of us will hit that mark too in the New Year.Dana
